text: Hearing the Govt may not be putting anyone up to speak to the media tomorrow morning despite UK death toll surging past 10,000 including 31 NHS staff. This is totally unacceptable @10DowningStreet @DominicRaab @MattHancock - don’t you dare hide from accountability.
